document_title: Difficulty breathing, shortness of breath: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content:
Sometimes, difficulty breathing can be a warning sign of a dangerous medical condition. Therefore, you need to see a doctor immediately if you experience any of the following symptoms:
The condition occurs over a long period of time with no clear cause;; Dyspnea has a sudden onset but is very severe;; Loss of ability to function due to difficulty breathing;; Chest pain;; Nausea;; Difficulty or inability to breathe when lying down;; Swelling of feet and ankles;; Fever, chills and cough;; Wheeze.
subsection_title: kho tho.json. When to see a doctor?
subsection_data:
